Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicRecyclerViewAdapter.DynamicRecyclerViewItem
    Implement this interface in the object class to get item type and section header text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicBinderAdapter<VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder>
    Simple recycler view adapter to display different types of items or views in a recycler view.
    DynamicItemsAdapter
    A DynamicSimpleBinderAdapter to display the list of DynamicItem inside a recycler view.
    DynamicRecyclerViewAdapter
    Simple recycler view adapter to display items in different sections.
    DynamicSimpleBinderAdapter<VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder>
    A simple recycler view adapter to implement the DynamicBinderAdapter and DynamicRecyclerViewBinder.
    DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E extends Enum<E>,VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder>
    A recycler view adapter to display different type of VB inside a recycler view.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DynamicTypeBinderAdapter.ItemViewType
    Default item type enums for this adapter.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    DynamicRecyclerViewAdapter.ItemType
    Valid item types for this adapter.
